identity.mission: Create a school management SaaS that feels like a modern productivity tool, not a legacy ERP. Clean, crisp, and highly legible.
principles: Clarity over Clutter: Data must be instantly scannable.
Action-Oriented: Primary actions (Mark Attendance, Pay Fee) must be obvious.
Trustworthy Aesthetics: Use stable, professional colors.
Role-Aware: Teachers see what they need; Principals see everything.

headings.usage: Use for all page titles, card headers, and modal titles. Tracking tight.

body.usage: Use for all standard text, tables, and form inputs. High legibility.

mono.usage: Use for student IDs, transaction references, and technical data.

rules: Never use pure black (#000000). Use Slate-900 (#0F172A).
Backgrounds must be clean white or very light slate (#F8FAFC).
Text must be high contrast against the light background.

layout.structure: Sidebar Navigation + Top Header + Main Content Area
layout.grid_system: Bento Grid for Dashboard (mix of 1x1, 2x1, 2x2 tiles)
layout.spacing: Generous padding (p-6 to p-8) inside cards. Gap-6 between grid items.
layout.responsive: Sidebar becomes a drawer on mobile. Tables become card lists on mobile.

buttons.style: Slightly rounded (rounded-md). Solid primary for main actions. Outline for secondary.

cards.style: Flat white background, subtle border (border-slate-200), minimal shadow (shadow-sm).

attendance_toggle.description: Custom component for marking attendance. NOT a dropdown.
attendance_toggle.style: Two buttons side-by-side: [Present (Green)] [Absent (Red)]. Selected state is solid, unselected is outline/ghost.

status_badge.style: Pill shape, low opacity background, high opacity text. e.g., bg-green-100 text-green-700.

visual_enhancers.shadows: Soft, diffuse shadows. Avoid harsh drop shadows.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid borders in Slate-200 to define structure.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React icons. Stroke width 1.5px or 2px.
visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: Smooth transitions on hover for buttons, table rows, and cards.

dashboard_student.usage: Dashboard welcome widget or student section header

specific_requirements.attendance: Must show last 60 days history. Toggle buttons for Present/Absent.
specific_requirements.fees: Bill creation with reasons (Monthly, Registration, etc.). Confirmation dialog before marking paid.
specific_requirements.multi_tenant: School name must be prominent in the header.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Attendance Toggle' as a custom component, do not use a Select/Dropdown.
Ensure the 'Fee Payment' flow has a confirmation modal.
Use the 'Manrope' font for all headings to give it a modern, distinct look.
Keep the UI very clean (Light Theme). Use whitespace to separate sections.
For the 'Students List', use a data table with filters for Class and Section.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) sparingly, mostly for sticky headers.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
